Improve this doc View source

pfSelect
directive in module patternfly

Description

An AngularJS wrapper for the Bootstrap-select jQuery plugin which is used as a default select decorator in Patternfly.

Usage

as attribute
<select pf-select
     ng-model="{string}"
     [ng-options="{string}"]>
   ...
</select>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
ngModelstring

Model binding using the NgModelController is mandatory.

ngOptions
(optional)
string

The <a href="https://docs.angularjs.org/api/ng/directive/select/">ngOptions</a> attribute can be used to dynamically generate a list of <option> elements for the <select> element.

Example

Source
